title: my main account got hacked
body:
my main account **[REDACTED]** got hacked and my email got changed so i cant do anything now
any advice?

replies.body:
Yes, first off, please refrain from giving your account ID out on the boards. That's not safe! D:

To get help with recovering your account, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Select 'I need help recovering my account', then fill out as much information as you can recall. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
